page.title: 06BBC TRANSMITTING STATION
page.content:
The BBC is landlord of the trans_ mitting station at Tacolneston & owns the freehold of the 12 acre site, most of the buildings on the site & the mast.The services transmitted from the 500 foot mast include BBC1,BBC2,ITV Anglia and Channel 4 in the UHF colour television band,BBC radio 1,2,3 &4 and BBC Radio Norfolk in the VHF/FM band.
In addition there are several other radio users,such as delivery and distribution firms who rent radio_ telephone facilities to keep in touch with their fleet vehicles.
Tacolneston is also the base for a small BBC transmitter maintenance team which is responsible for all the radio and television transmitters in East Anglia extending from Kings Lynn to Colchester.
